text.#text:
Each qualified employer shall be treated as having made a
				payment against the tax imposed by

For purposes of this section, the credit amount with
				respect to any qualified quarter is equal to 10 percent of the qualified
				payroll increase of such employer for such qualified quarter.

The total credit amount with respect to any employer
				shall not exceed $500,000 for all qualified quarters.
